if.test: jdh != null and jdh != '' and orgJgid != '01000000'

mapper.sql: t.xfssid jbxx_xfssid, t.jzid jbxx_jzid, t.xfssmc jbxx_xfssmc, t.xfsslx jbxx_xfsslx, t.iszddw jbxx_iszddw, t.zddwid jbxx_zddwid, t.delete_flag jbxx_deleteFlag, t.datasource jbxx_datasource, t.bz jbxx_bz, t.jdh jbxx_jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jbxx_sjc, t.reserve1 jbxx_reserve1, t.reserve2 jbxx_reserve2, t.reserve3 jbxx_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jbxx_reserve4, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFSS t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name jbxx_xfsslxmc, dz.dwmc jbxx_zddwmc, jz.jzmc jbxx_jzmc FROM YAGL_XFSS t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'XFSSLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.XFSSLX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join Yagl_Dx_Zddw dz On dz.uuid = t.zddwid And dz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join Yagl_Dwjzxx jz On jz.jzid = t.jzid And jz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
ORDER BY NVL(xgsj,cjsj) DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS jbxx_xfssid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_XFSS(xfssid,jzid,xfssmc,xfsslx,iszddw,zddwid,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj) VALUES(#{jbxx_xfssid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jbxx_jzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jbxx_xfssmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jbxx_xfsslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jbxx_iszddw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jbxx_zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{jbxx_datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jbxx_bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jbxx_jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jbxx_sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{jbxx_reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jbxx_reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jbxx_reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jbxx_reserve4,jdbcType=DATE},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_XFSS t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.xfssid = #{value}

UPDATE YAGL_XFSS
jzid=#{jbxx_jzid}, xfssmc=#{jbxx_xfssmc}, xfsslx=#{jbxx_xfsslx}, iszddw=#{jbxx_iszddw}, zddwid=#{jbxx_zddwid}, delete_flag=#{jbxx_deleteFlag}, datasource=#{jbxx_datasource}, bz=#{jbxx_bz},
sjc=TO_DATE(#{jbxx_sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{jbxx_reserve1}, reserve2=#{jbxx_reserve2}, reserve3=#{jbxx_reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{jbxx_reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), xgrid=#{xgrid}, xgrmc=#{xgrmc}, xgsj=sysdate
WHERE xfssid = #{jbxx_xfssid}

INSERT INTO YAGL_XFSS(xfssid,jzid,xfssmc,xfsslx,iszddw,zddwid,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.xfssid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfssid,#{item.jzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzid,#{item.xfssmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfssmc,#{item.xfsslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfsslx,#{item.iszddw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} iszddw,#{item.zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zddwid,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE xfssid = VALUES(xfssid), jzid = VALUES(jzid), xfssmc = VALUES(xfssmc), xfsslx = VALUES(xfsslx), iszddw = VALUES(iszddw), zddwid = VALUES(zddwid), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_XFSS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_AQSSCS_AQCK t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_AQSSCS_SSLT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_AQSSCS_XFDT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_AQSSCS_BNC t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, CASE t.ywyjgb WHEN '1' THEN '有' WHEN '0' THEN '无' END ywyjgb, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_AQSSCS_YJGB t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.xhssl xhssl, t.xhszdll xhszdll, t.plbsl plbsl, t.plbzdll plbzdll, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_XFBF t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sxrl sxrl, t.bjsd bjsd, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_XFSX t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sxrl sxrl, t.bjsd bjsd, CASE t.ywqsj WHEN '1' THEN '有' WHEN '0' THEN '无' END ywqsj, t.qsjwz qsjwz, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_XFSC t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, CASE t.sfky WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END sfky, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_SNXHS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, CASE t.sfky WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END sfky, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_SWXHS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.xh xh, t.azxs azxs, to_char(t.jskcc,'fm9999999990.00') jskcc, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, c2.code_name azxsmc FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_SBJHQ t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SBJHQAZXS' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and to_char(t.azxs) = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, CASE t.ywplxt WHEN '1' THEN '有' WHEN '0' THEN '无' END ywplxt, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_PLXT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, CASE t.ywlqsxt WHEN '1' THEN '有' WHEN '0' THEN '无' END ywlqsxt, t.gsqd gsqd, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_LQSXT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, CASE t.isky WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END isky, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_GDSP t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_BGDSS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.pmylx pmylx, t.pmycl pmycl, t.pmbzdll pmbzdll, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, c2.code_name pmylxmc FROM YAGL_XFSS_PMXT_PMBF t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'PMYLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.pmylx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, CASE t.isky WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END isky, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_PMXT_PMXHS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, CASE t.sfky WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END sfky, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_PMXT_GDPMP t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.xh xh, t.sl sl, t.ll ll, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_PMXT_PMFSQ t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_PMXT_BGDSS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.edyl edyl, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_ZQMHXT_GDS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.edyl edyl, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_ZQMHXT_BGDS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.wz wz, CASE t.iszdbj WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END iszdbj, CASE t.isldkz WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END isldkz, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFKZS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.wz wz, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_FPYCS_PYCYK t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.qbwz qbwz, CASE t.isky WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END isky, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_FPYCS_FPYXT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.qymj qymj, t.qywz qywz, t.fgss fgss, t.fgwz fgwz, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_FHFQ t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.qbwz qbwz, t.zyfw zyfw, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_QTMHXT_QTMHXT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.qbwz qbwz, t.zyfw zyfw, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_QTMHXT_GFMHXT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.wz wz, t.ms ms, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_QTXFSS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_XFSS_AQSSCS_AQCK(uuid,xfssid,ssjz,wz,sl,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfssid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssjz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})

SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_XFSS_AQSSCS_SSLT(uuid,xfssid,ssjz,wz,sl,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfssid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssjz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})

SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
